OpenProjectÂ 5.0.4

OpenProject 5.0.4 contains several bug fixes and performance improvements:

  • Copying projects works properly again (#22126).
  • Several work package related errors have been fixed (#22149, #22122, #21976, #21952).
  • The performance on the work package page has been improved (#22100, #22183).
  • In addition, several design bugs have been fixed (#22144, #22065, #22047).

For further information on the release, please refer to the Changelog v.5.0.4 take a look at GitHub.
